name: Keqing
description: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Has much to say about Rex Lapis' unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue - but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

skillTalents.name: Yunlai Kiếm Đơnsmanship
skillTalents.description:
Tấn công thường
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.
Trọng Kích
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid Kiếm Đơn strikes.
Nhảy Dậm
Đáp xuống đất từ trên không, tấn công kẻ địch trên đuờng và gây sát thương phạm vi.

upgrades.name: Thể Lực Trọng Kích Tiêu Hao
Sát Thương Khi Rơi Từ Độ Cao Thấp/Cao

skillTalents.name: Stellar Restoration
skillTalents.description:
Hurls a Lightning Stiletto that annihilates her enemies like the swift thunder.

When the Stiletto hits its target, it deals Lôi DMG to enemies in a small AoE, and places a Stiletto Mark on the spot hit.
Nhấn Giữ
Nhấn Giữ to adjust the direction in which the Stiletto shall be thrown.

Stilettos thrown by the Hold attack mode can be suspended in mid-air, allowing Keqing to jump to them when using Stellar Restoration a second time.
Lightning Stiletto
If Keqing uses Stellar Restoration again or uses a Trọng Kích while its Thời Gian Kéo Dài lasts, it will clear the Stiletto Mark and produce different effects:

If she uses Stellar Restoration again, she will blink to the location of the Mark and unleashed one slashing attack that deals AoE Lôi DMG. When blinking to a Stiletto that was thrown from a Holding attack, Keqing can leap across obstructing terrain.
If Keqing uses a Trọng Kích, she will ignite a series of thundering cuts at the Mark's location, dealing AoE Lôi DMG.

skillTalents.name: Starward Kiếm Đơn
skillTalents.description:
Keqing unleashes the power of lightning, dealing Lôi DMG in an AoE.
She then blends into the shadow of her blade, striking a series of thunderclap-blows to nearby enemies simultaneous that deal multiple instance of Lôi DMG. The final attack deals massive AoE Lôi DMG.

passiveTalents.name: Thundering Penance
passiveTalents.description: Within 5s of recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present, Keqing's Normal and Trọng Kíchs are converted to Lôi DMG.

passiveTalents.name: Aristocratic Dignity
passiveTalents.description: When casting Starward Kiếm Đơn, Keqing's CRIT Rate is increased by 15%, and her Energy Recharge is increased by 15%. This effect lasts for 8s.

passiveTalents.name: Land's Overseer
passiveTalents.description: Khi làm nhiệm vụ Phái Đi thám Hiểm ở Liyue, thời gian tiêu hao rút ngắn 25%.

constellations.name: Thundering Might
constellations.description: Recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as AoE Lôi DMG at the start point and terminus of her Blink.

constellations.name: Keen Extraction
constellations.description: When Keqing's Normal and Trọng Kích's hit enemies affected by Lôi, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle. This effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Forseen Reformation
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Starward Kiếm Đơn by 3.
Tăng nhiều nhất 15 cấp.

constellations.name: Attunement
constellations.description: For 10s after Keqing triggers an Lôi-related Elemental Reaction, her ATK is increased by 25%.

constellations.name: Beckoning Stars
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Stellar Restoration by 3.
Tăng nhiều nhất 15 cấp.

constellations.name: Tenacious Star
constellations.description: When initiating a Tấn công thường, Trọng Kích, Kỹ Năng Nguyên Tố or Kỹ Năng Nộ, Keqing gains a 6% Lôi DMG Bonus for 8s. Effects triggered by Tấn công thườngs, Trọng Kíchs, Kỹ Năng Nguyên Tốs and Kỹ Năng Nộs are considered independent entities.
